OOC: Ok sorry...

::FireBlade::
FireBlade now being close to the base caught the missile in tha back 
and flew in Khonkoker...He wheeled around and shot three EMP grenades 
in Sky Linx direction wheeling around to see Khonkoker again.

> OOC: There aren't popping out of nowhere.  When they went out of 
the base,

base and

mean.  I

whole area, 
> but Zardus will explain.
> 
> :::Sky Lynx/Cyclonus/Scourge:::
